text:
@jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden trump showed us how he could drink water with one hand and walk on a ramp, talked about buying TVs for Air Force One, rambled on about calling someone an SOB, incited division & encouraged violence & admitted to suppressing covid19 testing 

"Masterful Unleashed Winning Message"? https://t.co/TvFBHAFr7r
